name: Streadata.io API Gallery - OpenDNS
description: This is a repository of opendns APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: OpenDNS
apis.description: OpenDNS was founded in 2006 and acquired by Cisco in 2015. Today, more than 12,000 business worldwide rely on our enterprise security products. Cisco Umbrella is a cloud security platform that provides the first line of defense against threats on the i...
